page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up at 7.45 and wash myself.For breakfast I have Alpen and fruit juice.If there is time I watch Breakfast T.V. At 8.30 I walk to school with my friends and we play cricket in the yard until the bell rings at 9.00. My school is open plan and I am in the J3/J4 unit.I have two teachers. In the morning we do S.M.P., maths and language.Dinner is at 12.00.In the afternoon we do general studies, until school ends at 3.30.My primary school is six years old and has lovely grounds.We have a fish pond and a football field. After eating my favourite tea, pie and chips,I go out to play on my BMX bike.I come in at 9.00 and watch my own T.V. in my bedroom until I go to bed at 10.30. Richard Jones
